about_the_game:
The game is not yet available in English, but we are working very hard to make it multilingual very soon Regards, Uncle Ava

Battles in Nina NTMP are a vibrant and exciting experience. In a classic-style 2D environment, each encounter is full of action and strategy. With a wide variety of skills at your disposal, you must use items, cast powerful spells, and employ all your wits to emerge victorious. The excellent background soundtrack adds an extra layer of immersion, making each fight even more fun and lively. Get ready to face epic challenges and unravel the mysteries of this charming pixel art world.

In Nina NTMP, you'll meet well-developed and charismatic characters. The protagonist, Nina, is a cheerful and curious girl whose goal is to find the cure for the Great Sickness. At her side is her older brother, Gary, an overprotective bounty hunter who always looks out for her safety. There's also Iris, a very popular and respected doctor in Midgard II; also a master of magic, guiding Nina in her learning and helping her discover her true potential. Each character in Ocean View is carefully written and deeply developed, making their stories and relationships authentic and touching. Join Nina and her friends on this epic adventure full of magic, mystery, and exciting challenges.

Nina NTMP is an RPG game full of adventure and challenges. In this charming pixel art world, you will not only face enemies in exciting 2D battles, but you will also test your wits with a variety of clever puzzles and brain teasers.

The game is packed with mini-games, such as Cats and Crystals, a collectible card game that will keep you entertained for hours. In addition, you will have the opportunity to operate and upgrade an MT machine, solve technical problems, fix radios and face puzzles that will challenge your mind.

Every aspect of Nina NTMP is designed to offer a rich and varied experience, ensuring that there is always something new and exciting to discover.

Nina NTMP's story is captivating and will draw you in from the first moment. Once you start, you won't be able to stop, always on the lookout for the resolution of the mysteries that unfold throughout Nina's journey. Join Nina on her quest to find the cure for the Great Sickness, a journey that will lead her to uncover deep secrets about her family and the world of magic.

Every step in this adventure is full of surprises and revelations, keeping you on the edge of your seat as you explore the enchanting world of Vista Oceánica. The narrative is carefully crafted to deliver an immersive and exciting experience, ensuring that every moment is memorable.

The dungeons in Nina NTMP are truly challenging and designed to test your wits and skills. Each dungeon is filled with difficult puzzles, clever tricks, and hidden secrets that will keep you on your toes at all times.

Face challenging bosses that won't make it easy for you and will require all your strategy and skill to defeat. Keep your map close to avoid getting lost in the intricate labyrinths, where every corner may hide a new surprise or unexpected danger.

Explore these dungeons and uncover the mysteries they hold, as you immerse yourself in a classic RPG experience full of excitement and adventure.

The game takes place in Midgard II, a place plagued by terrifying and colorful monsters called jellies. This diverse world includes arid deserts, towering mountains, vast plains with hidden secrets, beautiful and gorgeous villages, mysterious swamps, and hidden caverns where some jellies hide. Each area is filled with unique challenges and mysteries to uncover, making your adventure a rich and varied experience.

name: Nina NTMP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

short_description: Ocean View is a world where magic flows and mysteries await you around every corner. In this charming place lives Nina, a curious and somewhat antisocial girl whose goal in life is to find the cure for the Great Sickness. Join her on her classic RPG-style pixel art adventure.
